resources.string: Fud5 uses this feature to give you localized restaurant recommendations. This will help all apps on your phone determine the device\'s location. Anonymous location data may be sent to Google even when no apps are running. You can activate this feature later.\n\nIf you press \"Yes\", you will be taken to Android Location Settings.

By pressing the "I Agree" button when this End-User License Agreement (EULA) is presented the first time you run this application (FüD5), you agree to the terms listed below. If you do not agree, exit and uninstall the application.

Note that not all venues have menus. A Locu ID is comprised of 20 alphanumeric characters.
